channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: 3ABN Today
channel.desc: If you've ever felt a call to mission work or simply want to learn more about ministry, don't miss this program! Join us for an inspiring 3ABN Today with Streams of Light International's exciting new venture: the launch of their training institute dedicated to equipping missionary workers for service in large cities around the world.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: A Day With the King
channel.desc: Three men stand for what is right, even though they are threatened with death.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: 3ABN Kids Camp Sing Along
channel.desc: The hosts teach young campers a variety of Christian songs and dances as they share the message of God.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Kids Camp Critters & Creation
channel.desc: Meeting God's creatures and observing his creation, from rocks and fossils to animals with silky fur and shiny scales.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Authentic With Shawn Boonstra
channel.desc: Shawn Boonstra talks about the face and nature of evil and discusses humanity's propensity for committing evil acts.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Your Favorites by Request
channel.desc: Host Tim Parton and guest Yvonne Lewis-Shelton sing favorites, new and old, about the blessings people have in Christ and the peace that he brings, even if life is seemingly going all wrong.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Jesus 4 Asia Now
channel.desc: Missionary family, the Nortons, are lead of God to establish a home to care for children in Thailand that come from broken homes.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Child Impact International
channel.desc: The future of Twing Memorial School in Tanzania looks hopeful with support from Child Impact donors.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Miracles in Motion
channel.desc: Hershell finds his way to the Lord later in life; raised in Oklahoma and moving schools frequently, he begins his spiritual journey at age 70, finding solace in Pastor Murray's sermons at Shepherd's Chapel.
